page.title: 07Family Sunday
page.content: Michelle Smith age 8 On Sunday morning I helped mum do the spring cleaning. I cleaned the cooker, polished the television and lots more. At lunch time I had beef,potatoes, cauliflower and Yorkshire pudding. In the afternoon, I did a lot. I played with my friend Hayley, we had a plastic barrel which we tried to walk on but kept falling off. I also went to Towcester to see my Nan and Pop, they gave me a drink of Coca Cola and one pound. My dad took all day to put the finishing touches to our new windows. My mum spent most of the day cleaning and ironing.
